title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.8 - Local areas subject to control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2500.8 - Local areas subject to control

State Regulations

Except as hereinafter provided in section
2500.9
of this Part, this

Subchapter shall apply to housing accommodations located in the counties of

Nassau, Rockland and Westchester, which are subject to the Emergency Tenant

Protection Act of 1974 pursuant to a determination of the existence of an
emergency thereunder by the local legislative body of the city, town or village
wherein the accommodations are situated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2500.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
